website_summaries.verdict: Choose if you like the bag, which offers better quality than the StowAway boxes that come with it.
pros: side pockets are ideal for small tools and tackle pieces
cons: The latches on some of the StowAway boxes don't fasten securely, and the plastic feels thin

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice bag! Lots of flexible storage
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice bag! Lots of flexible storage. Most of my fishing is either out of a canoe or using my Jeep as a "home base" as I fish from shore or wade in streams, this tackle bag has a spot for everything. Another bonus is that additional 3650 boxes are readily available locally for just a few dollars, really nice for changing seasons or fishing spots. I really like the plastic top and bottom to help with splashes and the rubber bumpers on the bottom are a nice touch. Well designed, well made, I can see myself using this system for a long time. Highly recommended if you often fish out of a canoe or kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: this is the best for my tackle
customer_reviews.text: Compact, extremely well suited to organize your/our fishing equipment. Heavy duty built to last years of use, and yes, even some abuse. I've fished for 70 years, this is the best for my tackle. Get the 3600 size, you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Aultman

customer_reviews.title: Great Box. Missing tray.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tackle box however the 3600 was missing one tray. The description says it comes with six but only 5 arrived. Rating will change depending on company reaponse.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box! Effectively holds all my lures for salt and freshwater fishing with enough room for me to stuff a slim bottle of sunscreen and a flat boonie hat inside the big pocket. The front pocket holds usefull items such as line clippers, steel leader etc.. the pliers pocket with the velcro works well, i leave my pliers on a leash and have it clipped to the shoulder strap so i dont drop them into the water. Back pocket is just big enough for a fillet knife and a small towel for hands or sweat.
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: ADAPTABLE AND STURDY
customer_reviews.text: Tackle boxes are, for me, a necessary evil. They're all a little bit good a little bit bad. From cigar boxes to big boy rigs. This bag type checks a lot of boxes. I like to work the shoreline when I'm not in a boat. And carrying baits and hooks etc can be a problem. I started with a smaller version, but this fills the bill. Made sturdy. Good fasteners. Outer straps and bungees make it very adaptable.
customer_reviews.author: wolfinwolfsclothing

customer_reviews.title: prob best light tackle box
customer_reviews.text: I had an older lighter, cheaper plano tackle box I bought from walmart that was barely hanging in there by a thread, literally. I saw this come up on a deal so I placed the order and this thing is made of quality and its decked out with smart ways to maximize storage. I transferred everything thing over from my old box and then some and I still have yet to fill all the storage space this bag has.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy bag. The hard bottom with rubber non-slip feet and the hard top with bungee to strap a box on top is convenient. The material appears to be thick and durable, and the bag holds it's shape when the storage boxes are removed. There are plenty of attachment points for accessories along the hard bottom and top. Minor complaints would be the size of the front zippered pouch (smallish in depth) and the cheapness of the plastic tackle utility boxes. Compared to older versions they are more flimsy, brittle and the tabs that clip them shut tend to fall off.
customer_reviews.author: MrHessMan

customer_reviews.title: The best tacklebag you can get!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the storage area on the back, it holds a nice amount of gear. And also love the hard bottom with legs for keeping it out of the dirt! The tacklebox is wonderful to take along on kayaking trips and bank fishing trips! I highly recommend this to serious anglers. Its one of the best tackle bags I have owned!!! Thanks again!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great father’s day gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a father’s day gift for my dad. He’s in his 60s and loves fishing, but his old tackle boxes were falling apart. He said he really likes this one a lot. He has used it several times already in just a month or so. The multiple plastic boxes seem more complicated to me, but he doesn’t seem to mind!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tackle bag. It has really organized all my tackle. Id give it 5 stars, but the shoulder strap clip gets stuck on the lid alot and gets in the way while zipping/unzipping. It seems like a minor design flaw. Everything else about it is awesome. I will never go back to a conventional tackle box again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Wienholz

customer_reviews.title: Bag is awesome, boxes are nothing to write home about
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great bag! I bought this for camp and for walleye fishing. I'll keep my big main tackle box at home and take the most commonly used baits and lures. The bag is awesome but the boxes that came with it leave something to be desired. They're flimsy and I'm not crazy about the dividers. I will probably replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Rob K.

customer_reviews.title: Like the bag
customer_reviews.text: Like the bag. Not too big and not too small. I can bring it on a kayak or pack it into a remote lake. Caries almost everything I need for a day out fishing.
customer_reviews.author: catuualos

customer_reviews.title: Great Plano product
customer_reviews.text: Plano is top quality product, I both for my husband birthday. Really great idea, coming with 5 Plano transparent boxes. There is design to have one box always located on the top to have Easy access. Now whenever he goes with kids for fishing always are ready. Really recommended
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good some fsr
customer_reviews.text: Good bag so far. The zipper mechanism needs a second zipper, and some of the tray dividers are permanent which gets awkward when you first load it up. Still trying to figure out the best configuration for stuff I. The trays. Could probably use one double height tray for larger stuff. Or 2 trays at 1.5 height?
customer_reviews.author: tim m.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic Clasp.
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the product until the plastic clasp broke. I suggest making another product or reinforcing the piece.The images will show a new tackle box and the broken piece.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a well built case and is a good value. I bought it for my trout fishing equipment. It works well for that but can get heavy and cumbersome depending on how much equipment you put in it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: One tackle box to rule them all
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tackle box, tons of storage and organization. The 6 included boxes are more than enough for all of my tackle and tools. Pro Tip: the bottom is shaped exactly as the top, which means you can easily take a small length of cordage or bungee and attach a 7th box to the bottom. (Just like the top). Overall I am a greatly satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Clay T.

customer_reviews.title: Light, durable, and great value.
customer_reviews.text: Just right. Nice size and compartments are very well sized. Containers are customizable. Very well made product.
customer_reviews.author: brian gunter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of space
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of storage, if it were any bigger it would be way too much to carry around for casual fishing. I can fit (5) 3600s, (2) 3500s, and another (1)3600 box on the top. With plenty of room for my plastics on the outside netting.
customer_reviews.author: Ramosgv

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!
customer_reviews.text: I use a fishing kayak & find this product both highly versatile & well-suited to my needs & style of fishing. They offer larger or smaller versions to accommodate your needs/or style. This size meets my needs for river/stream, lake or pond use & allows me to use my fly rod or spinning gear. I find it to be exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: Paul W. Kneedler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Not only is this thing amazing for keeping everything organized, but I forgot a beer in this thing outside in my truck on a 90 degree day, and it was still cold the next day when I got back out to the lake. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Hardman

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Carries everything I could need with room to spare. Great boat bag!
customer_reviews.author: Karl K. Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Good size bag for my style
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice compact tackle box, I think I will like the size. I took a star away because the top stowaway strap is damaged and it will not hold the box securely to the top. Other than that I like the setup overall.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: I wish we bought it sooner!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I absolutely love our bag!!! I wish we would’ve bought it sooner. We have 7 tackle boxes in ours. Plus there are pockets to store stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good tackle box for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size and well made. Would recommend to the new angler. Lots of storage both inside and outide.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Well executed, minor room for improvements.
customer_reviews.text: Well made bag, as expected from Plano. Mine did not come with 6 but actually only 5 of the 3650 cases. It will, however, hold 6. Zippers are not YKK, but appear to be well made. Net pouches are rubber coated, which is a nice feature. There is a clear velcro pouch in the front pocket which suffices, but a zipper would have been nicer for ease of access. Also has rubber non-slip “feet” to keep the box where you put it. Overall, well executed.
customer_reviews.author: Fippingers

customer_reviews.title: Good product and quality
customer_reviews.text: Great value and quality. May be too small for serious angler, but perfect if you don’t cary tons of tackle and equipment. I use for salt water fishing from a boat in Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Tackle Bag I have ever owned and I am 66 and have a lot of old ones
customer_reviews.text: Gtreat fishing tackle bag ,bought 2 and they are great, comes with 5 boxes that will all fit inside and the one you want to use that day on top for easy acess
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastics use on this
customer_reviews.text: Clip on the straps broke. Not as sturdy as expected although the size is large.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: goog product for kayaks
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and came with standard sized trays. Trays weren't the best quality, but were decent and are adjustable enough to hold buzz baits.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Good all around table bag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality comes with the clear boxes. Pockets are nice hold a lot more than it looks like it will
customer_reviews.author: Pinkerbelle

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: Good size, like the bag. You can store another tray on top of the 5 trays inside. I like that, no room wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Really love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Really love this bag. Quickly became our favorite tackle box/bag. It can hold a ton of lures. The only negative I have found is that it does not seem to have any place for spinner baits. Every tackle box seems to have some sort of drawback. This one has the least of any that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Scott P.

customer_reviews.title: A great tackle box.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to downsize and this seems perfect in the 3600 size. Still holds a large amount of tackle. Appears to be very well built and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T Ammerman

customer_reviews.title: Great weekend fresh water box.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tackle box. Only improvement would be one of the boxes to be open. Hard cramming bags of worms in there.
customer_reviews.author: SoFlaFish

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of storage room and a great looking tackle bag
customer_reviews.text: The pictures online make this bag seem smaller than it is. Plenty of storage room and a great looking tackle bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Christie

customer_reviews.title: great price, great tackle
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i was after. great price, great tackle bag. I would say if you are considering something smaller don't. This is pretty standard size and fills up quick but is a great size for portability. as others mention the tray's that come are pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Witucki

customer_reviews.title: Great storage, penty of room for everything.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. The bottom is plastic so it should last longer than my last Plano bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for me.
customer_reviews.text: A perfect size for my Jon boat and it holds a ton of stuff. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: William Huff

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Bag nice that it comes with some extra stuff and not just the bag
customer_reviews.author: Tonto

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely superb! Good materials good storage, pretty much a perfect tackle bag
customer_reviews.author: mason

customer_reviews.title: What a great present from my Wife
customer_reviews.text: The best available and very practicle. Components also locally available.
customer_reviews.author: Johan d.

customer_reviews.title: I’d like to be able to send it back and get ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tackle box/bag a little over a month ago for my husband and the front pocket zipper has already broken and is nonfunctional. I’d like to be able to send it back and get a replacement one but I don’t see a place to contact the seller. Other than that, he really likes it and would like another.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box.i love it.the zippers are very high quality and all my gear fits in real nice
customer_reviews.author: Ceezz

customer_reviews.title: Great Tackle Box
customer_reviews.text: Holds a lot of tackle and extras. Easy to carry. Very well organized.
customer_reviews.author: cham johnston

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Tackle Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Deal of the Day item. Nicest fishing tackle bag I ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kim

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for all my gear just wish there ...
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for all my gear just wish there was a way to carry more soft plastics in there packages
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Missing One 3650 stowaways
customer_reviews.text: Item description states it comes with 6 stowaways. Mine only came with 5. Update your description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about it. Has storage for anything you could reasonably want.
customer_reviews.author: James Gray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with his new tackle box/bag. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bag I’ve found for canoe fishing
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Plenty of storage. Great bag for a canoe fishing set up
customer_reviews.author: Matthew D.

customer_reviews.title: Great tackle box ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tackle box .. great way to keep your baits separated.
customer_reviews.author: mike king

customer_reviews.title: Arrived promptly. Gave it to my son for Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Gave it to my son for Christmas...he said it was "awesome".
customer_reviews.author: Carol W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best bag I have ever bought, its worth it, youll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jose D Zubiate

customer_reviews.title: This tackle bag is the perfect size for a novice fisherman
customer_reviews.text: This tackle bag is the perfect size for a novice fisherman. And I purchased it through Amazon at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald n. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Tackle box
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Exactly what I needed to get my gear in order
customer_reviews.author: chytr

product_meta.title: Plano 466331 Guide Series 3600 Fishing Bait
product_meta.description: The leader in tackle storage innovation, Plano, introduces the new and improved Guide Series Tackle Bag. Equipped with six 3650 stow aways, 3 exterior zipper pockets, and 4 slip pockets there is plenty of room for every bait in your aresenal. The sturdy rail system makes it the ultimate Kayak tackle bag with a Perimeter that includes seventeen attachment points to hold accessories, receive tie-down straps, secure carabiners, etc. The base includes an over-molded rubber surface on each corner grips floor surfaces and prevent sliding (fiberglass decks, marine carpet, etc.) The base design also elevates the bag slightly to be clear of standing water. The innovative Plano Guide series bag is available in 3500, 3600, and 3700 sizes.
feature_bullets: Collapsible side pockets provide slimmer profile when needed
Interior holds 6 Stowaways (plus one on the lid/exterior) and has a clear zippered pocket. Includes 6 3560 size stows
Exterior has 3 zippered pockets, 4 slip pockets and 2 D-Rings
Innovative sturdy plastic lid and base featuring new Plano Rail System. Tool Holders on each side pocket
